name: Marvel Boys Red Shoes
description:
Style Note
A great shoe for casual days out, the Spider-Man shoe from marvel makes for a perfect addition to your little one's wardrobe. With a soft canvas upper, cushioned footbed and grippy outsole, you are assured that your little one has their feet firm on the ground.

Product Details
Black and red synthetic leather upper for flexibility and durability
Padded tongue and collar for snug comfort
Midfoot Velcro straps with branding for a custom Fit
Padded footbed with fabric inner lining for sweat-free comfort
Appliqued cartoon on the lateral midfoot
Durable rubber outsole strategically grooved for absolute grip and traction

Material and Care
Rubber, TPU
Wipe with a clean damp cloth to remove dust
Do not store under sunlight
